title: SAMURAI WARRIORS 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports English. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Tctical action returns to feudal Japan! Online vs play makes its Xbox Live debut!

childDownloads.title: Chiyojo Mochizuki for Hire
childDownloads.description: The guard Chiyojo Mochizuki will become available for employment at the game Shop. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: SAMURAI WARRIORS 2 Xtreme Legends EN
childDownloads.description: “Samurai Warriors 2 Xtreme Legends” is an expansion pack with new content to complement “Samurai Warriors 2” for the Xbox 360. Customers who already own “Samurai Warriors 2” for the Xbox 360 can play “Samurai Warriors 2 Xtreme Legends” after downloading this content from the Xbox LIVE Marketplace. Please note that “Samurai Warriors 2 Xtreme Legends” is not playable as a separate game; it is only available to those who already own a copy of “Samurai Warriors 2” There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
